content.description: Begin on the easy corner and finish through the exciting and desperate face.
content.location: At the very left of the cave.

content.description: The line ascends straight up from the v-notch the trends left and finishes trending right. large jugs spaced at reachy lengths mark the the path to the end.
content.protection: Single Rack to 0.75" double 0.6". Bolted Anchor.
content.location: About 10 feet left of Spider Hole near the dihedral like wall feature.

content.description: Stand on the boulder at the base of the cave use a creative stemming move to avoid the harder direct start to Box Car Willie. The route then follows the thin crack to the top.
content.protection: Single Rack to 1.5" Protection can be hard to find at first but is good once located. The Anchor is bolted
content.location: Just to the right of the left end of he cave. The start is standing on the small boulder which allows you to grab the vertical column features.

content.description: Stand on the boulder at the base of the cave and climb directly through the bouldery overhang. Avoid stemming on the left wall for the 5.11c variation. The route then follows the thin crack to the top.
content.protection: Single Rack to 1.5" Protection can be hard to find at first but is good once located. The Anchor is bolted
content.location: Just to the right of the left end of he cave. The start is standing on the small boulder which allows you to grab the vertical column features.
